title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Advanced Communication Skills Development Using Virtual Patient Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Implement emotional empathy responses in virtual patient scenarios with over 80% accuracy
Simplify complex medical information for non-experts using no more than three steps
Apply a five-stage conflict resolution model through role-playing with SPs (standardized patients) in conflict situations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
